section.name: Struts and JavaServer Faces Integration Library
section.p: The "Struts-Faces" package contains an add-on library that supports the use of JavaServer Faces (JSF) user interface technology in a Struts based web application, in place of the Struts custom tag libraries.

The Struts-Faces Integration Library should work with any implementation of JavaServer Faces, version 1.0 or later. It has primarily been tested against version 1.1 of the JavaServer Faces reference implementation, available at:
http://java.sun.com/j2ee/javaserverfaces/
For more information, consult the README file.

section.name: Struts-Faces Issue Tracking
section.p: Please report any bugs, or log any enhancement requests, in the Struts JIRA Issue Tracker, using project Struts Action 1 and component Faces.
